tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE weather_data (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  precipitation FLOAT,
  timestamp DATETIME
);

CREATE TABLE soil_nutrients (
  nutrient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  nitrogen FLOAT,
  phosphorus FLOAT,
  potassium FLOAT,
  calcium FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
  weather_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  precipitation FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE soil_nutrients (
  nutrient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  nitrogen FLOAT,
  phosphorus FLOAT,
  potassium FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE crop_yield (
  yield_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(255),
  yield_amount FLOAT,
  year INT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  reading_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_data(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(255),
    reading_time TIMESTAMP,
    value FLOAT
);
